
`get_vespadb_obs()` supports a number of query parameters that allow you to get a subset of the observations in the database. 

This is an overview of the parameters that are allowed:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(get_observation_parameters())
```
